00039 HelpWindow::HelpWindow( const QString& home_, const QString& _path,
00040                         QWidget* parent, const char *name )
00041     : QMainWindow( parent, name, WDestructiveClose ),
00042       pathCombo( 0 ), selectedURL()
00043 {
00044     readHistory();
00045     readBookmarks();
00046 
00047     browser = new QTextBrowser( this );
00048 
00049     browser->mimeSourceFactory()->setFilePath( _path );
00050     browser->setFrameStyle( QFrame::Panel | QFrame::Sunken );
00051     connect( browser, SIGNAL( textChanged() ),
00052              this, SLOT( textChanged() ) );
00053 
00054     setCentralWidget( browser );
00055 
00056     if ( !home_.isEmpty() )
00057         browser->setSource( home_ );
00058 
00059     connect( browser, SIGNAL( highlighted( const QString&) ),
00060              statusBar(), SLOT( message( const QString&)) );
00061 
00062     resize( 640,700 );
00063 
00064     QPopupMenu* file = new QPopupMenu( this );
00065     file->insertItem( tr("&New Window"), this, SLOT( newWindow() ), CTRL+Key_N );
00066     file->insertItem( tr("&Open File"), this, SLOT( openFile() ), CTRL+Key_O );
00067     file->insertItem( tr("&Print"), this, SLOT( print() ), CTRL+Key_P );
00068     file->insertSeparator();
00069     file->insertItem( tr("&Close"), this, SLOT( close() ), CTRL+Key_Q );
00070 //as    file->insertItem( tr("E&xit"), qApp, SLOT( closeAllWindows() ), CTRL+Key_X );
00071 
00072     // The same three icons are used twice each.
00073     QIconSet icon_back( QPixmap("help/back.xpm") );
00074     QIconSet icon_forward( QPixmap("help/forward.xpm") );
00075     QIconSet icon_home( QPixmap("help/home.xpm") );
00076 
00077     QPopupMenu* go = new QPopupMenu( this );
00078     backwardId = go->insertItem( icon_back,
00079                                  tr("&Backward"), browser, SLOT( backward() ),
00080                                  CTRL+Key_Left );
00081     forwardId = go->insertItem( icon_forward,
00082                                 tr("&Forward"), browser, SLOT( forward() ),
00083                                 CTRL+Key_Right );
00084     go->insertItem( icon_home, tr("&Home"), browser, SLOT( home() ) );
00085 
00086     QPopupMenu* help = new QPopupMenu( this );
00087     help->insertItem( tr("&About ..."), this, SLOT( about() ) );
00088     help->insertItem( tr("About &Qt ..."), this, SLOT( aboutQt() ) );
00089 
00090     hist = new QPopupMenu( this );
00091     QStringList::Iterator it = history.begin();
00092     for ( ; it != history.end(); ++it )
00093         mHistory[ hist->insertItem( *it ) ] = *it;
00094     connect( hist, SIGNAL( activated( int ) ),
00095              this, SLOT( histChosen( int ) ) );
00096 
00097     bookm = new QPopupMenu( this );
00098     bookm->insertItem( tr( "Add Bookmark" ), this, SLOT( addBookmark() ) );
00099     bookm->insertSeparator();
00100 
00101     QStringList::Iterator it2 = bookmarks.begin();
00102     for ( ; it2 != bookmarks.end(); ++it2 )
00103         mBookmarks[ bookm->insertItem( *it2 ) ] = *it2;
00104     connect( bookm, SIGNAL( activated( int ) ),
00105              this, SLOT( bookmChosen( int ) ) );
00106 
00107     menuBar()->insertItem( tr("&File"), file );
00108     menuBar()->insertItem( tr("&Go"), go );
00109     menuBar()->insertItem( tr( "History" ), hist );
00110     menuBar()->insertItem( tr( "Bookmarks" ), bookm );
00111     menuBar()->insertSeparator();
00112     menuBar()->insertItem( tr("&Help"), help );
00113 
00114     menuBar()->setItemEnabled( forwardId, FALSE);
00115     menuBar()->setItemEnabled( backwardId, FALSE);
00116     connect( browser, SIGNAL( backwardAvailable( bool ) ),
00117              this, SLOT( setBackwardAvailable( bool ) ) );
00118     connect( browser, SIGNAL( forwardAvailable( bool ) ),
00119              this, SLOT( setForwardAvailable( bool ) ) );
00120 
00121 
00122     QToolBar* toolbar = new QToolBar( this );
00123     addToolBar( toolbar, "Toolbar");
00124     QToolButton* button;
00125 
00126     button = new QToolButton( icon_back, tr("Backward"), "", browser, SLOT(backward()), toolbar );
00127     connect( browser, SIGNAL( backwardAvailable(bool) ), button, SLOT( setEnabled(bool) ) );
00128     button->setEnabled( FALSE );
00129     button = new QToolButton( icon_forward, tr("Forward"), "", browser, SLOT(forward()), toolbar );
00130     connect( browser, SIGNAL( forwardAvailable(bool) ), button, SLOT( setEnabled(bool) ) );
00131     button->setEnabled( FALSE );
00132     button = new QToolButton( icon_home, tr("Home"), "", browser, SLOT(home()), toolbar );
00133 
00134     toolbar->addSeparator();
00135 
00136     pathCombo = new QComboBox( TRUE, toolbar );
00137     connect( pathCombo, SIGNAL( activated( const QString & ) ),
00138              this, SLOT( pathSelected( const QString & ) ) );
00139     toolbar->setStretchableWidget( pathCombo );
00140     setRightJustification( TRUE );
00141     setDockEnabled( DockLeft, FALSE );
00142     setDockEnabled( DockRight, FALSE );
00143 
00144     pathCombo->insertItem( home_ );
00145     browser->setFocus();
00146 
00147 }

00150 void HelpWindow::setBackwardAvailable( bool b)
00151 {
00152     menuBar()->setItemEnabled( backwardId, b);
00153 }
00154 
00155 void HelpWindow::setForwardAvailable( bool b)
00156 {
00157     menuBar()->setItemEnabled( forwardId, b);
00158 }

00161 void HelpWindow::textChanged()
00162 {
00163     if ( browser->documentTitle().isNull() )
00164         setCaption( "Qt Example - Helpviewer - " + browser->context() );
00165     else
00166         setCaption( "Qt Example - Helpviewer - " + browser->documentTitle() ) ;
00167 
00168     selectedURL = browser->context();
00169 
00170     if ( !selectedURL.isEmpty() && pathCombo ) {
00171         bool exists = FALSE;
00172         int i;
00173         for ( i = 0; i < pathCombo->count(); ++i ) {
00174             if ( pathCombo->text( i ) == selectedURL ) {
00175                 exists = TRUE;
00176                 break;
00177             }
00178         }
00179         if ( !exists ) {
00180             pathCombo->insertItem( selectedURL, 0 );
00181             pathCombo->setCurrentItem( 0 );
00182             mHistory[ hist->insertItem( selectedURL ) ] = selectedURL;
00183         } else
00184             pathCombo->setCurrentItem( i );
00185         selectedURL = QString::null;
00186     }
00187 }
00188 
00189 HelpWindow::~HelpWindow()
00190 {
00191     history.clear();
00192     QMap<int, QString>::Iterator it = mHistory.begin();
00193     for ( ; it != mHistory.end(); ++it )
00194         history.append( *it );
00195 
00196     QFile f( QDir::currentDirPath() + "/.history" );
00197     f.open( IO_WriteOnly );
00198     QDataStream s( &f );
00199     s << history;
00200     f.close();
00201 
00202     bookmarks.clear();
00203     QMap<int, QString>::Iterator it2 = mBookmarks.begin();
00204     for ( ; it2 != mBookmarks.end(); ++it2 )
00205         bookmarks.append( *it2 );
00206 
00207     QFile f2( QDir::currentDirPath() + "/.bookmarks" );
00208     f2.open( IO_WriteOnly );
00209     QDataStream s2( &f2 );
00210     s2 << bookmarks;
00211     f2.close();
00212 }

00215 {
00216     QMessageBox::about( this, "HelpViewer Example",
00217                         "<p>This example implements a simple HTML help viewer "
00218                         "using Qt's rich text capabilities</p>"
00219                         "<p>It's just about 100 lines of C++ code, so don't expect too much :-)</p>"
00220                         );
00221 }

00229 void HelpWindow::openFile()
00230 {
00231 #ifndef QT_NO_FILEDIALOG
00232     QString fn = QFileDialog::getOpenFileName( QString::null, QString::null, this );
00233     if ( !fn.isEmpty() )
00234         browser->setSource( fn );
00235 #endif
00236 }

00238 void HelpWindow::newWindow()
00239 {
00240     ( new HelpWindow(browser->source(), "qbrowser") )->show();
00241 }
00242 
00243 void HelpWindow::print()
00244 {
00245 #ifndef QT_NO_PRINTER
00246     QPrinter printer;
00247     printer.setFullPage(TRUE);
00248     if ( printer.setup( this ) ) {
00249         QPainter p( &printer );
00250         QPaintDeviceMetrics metrics(p.device());
00251         int dpix = metrics.logicalDpiX();
00252         int dpiy = metrics.logicalDpiY();
00253         const int margin = 72; // pt
00254         QRect body(margin*dpix/72, margin*dpiy/72,
00255                    metrics.width()-margin*dpix/72*2,
00256                    metrics.height()-margin*dpiy/72*2 );
00257         QSimpleRichText richText( browser->text(), QFont(), browser->context(), browser->styleSheet(),
00258                                   browser->mimeSourceFactory(), body.height() );
00259         richText.setWidth( &p, body.width() );
00260         QRect view( body );
00261         int page = 1;
00262         do {
00263             richText.draw( &p, body.left(), body.top(), view, colorGroup() );
00264             view.moveBy( 0, body.height() );
00265             p.translate( 0 , -body.height() );
00266             p.drawText( view.right() - p.fontMetrics().width( QString::number(page) ),
00267                         view.bottom() + p.fontMetrics().ascent() + 5, QString::number(page) );
00268             if ( view.top()  >= richText.height() )
00269                 break;
00270             printer.newPage();
00271             page++;
00272         } while (TRUE);
00273     }
00274 #endif
00275 }
00276 
00277 void HelpWindow::pathSelected( const QString &_path )
00278 {
00279     browser->setSource( _path );
00280     QMap<int, QString>::Iterator it = mHistory.begin();
00281     bool exists = FALSE;
00282     for ( ; it != mHistory.end(); ++it ) {
00283         if ( *it == _path ) {
00284             exists = TRUE;
00285             break;
00286         }
00287     }
00288     if ( !exists )
00289         mHistory[ hist->insertItem( _path ) ] = _path;
00290 }
00291 
00292 void HelpWindow::readHistory()
00293 {
00294     if ( QFile::exists( QDir::currentDirPath() + "/.history" ) ) {
00295         QFile f( QDir::currentDirPath() + "/.history" );
00296         f.open( IO_ReadOnly );
00297         QDataStream s( &f );
00298         s >> history;
00299         f.close();
00300         while ( history.count() > 20 )
00301             history.remove( history.begin() );
00302     }
00303 }
00304 
00305 void HelpWindow::readBookmarks()
00306 {
00307     if ( QFile::exists( QDir::currentDirPath() + "/.bookmarks" ) ) {
00308         QFile f( QDir::currentDirPath() + "/.bookmarks" );
00309         f.open( IO_ReadOnly );
00310         QDataStream s( &f );
00311         s >> bookmarks;
00312         f.close();
00313     }
00314 }
00315 
00316 void HelpWindow::histChosen( int i )
00317 {
00318     if ( mHistory.contains( i ) )
00319         browser->setSource( mHistory[ i ] );
00320 }
00321 
00322 void HelpWindow::bookmChosen( int i )
00323 {
00324     if ( mBookmarks.contains( i ) )
00325         browser->setSource( mBookmarks[ i ] );
00326 }
00327 
00328 void HelpWindow::addBookmark()
00329 {
00330     mBookmarks[ bookm->insertItem( caption() ) ] = browser->context();
00331 }
